readable.title: 3004291093_35d6fd8548
readable.content: A man has bleached tips in his Afro style hair and is on a cellphone . A man with black hair and blonde tips talks on his cellphone A man with crazy hair is sitting with his fingers in his ears . A man with dreadlocks is plugging his ear to hear a phone call . A person with lots of hair and a Pac-man jacket is making a phone call .
